message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  We can negotiate later, but this is a good starting point.
Alice, that's a tough start.  I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Inflation is hurting you more each round, so a fair deal now is better than risking it all later.
Bob, I understand inflation is working against me.  But I'm not giving up that easily. Let's split it 50/50, fair and square.  We both get a good chunk, and we can avoid further risk.
